name: ReplaceVariables
description: Replace variables in any type of file readable by .net framework
author: Baskar Lingam Ramachandran <bskr.psgtech@gmail.com; baskisumi@hotmail.com>
helpMarkDown: Use this task to replace variables in any kind of file readable by .net framework

inputs.name: FilePattern
inputs.label: FilePattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: In each line enter the wildcard pattern. For example, *.config will match all .config files.

inputs.name: Recursive
inputs.label: Recursive?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this to search for the given file/file pattern in all sub folders of the given folder.

inputs.name: RegexPattern
inputs.label: Regex Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the Regex Pattern to use. Multiple values are supported. Enter 1 pattern in each line. Use \_\_(\w+)\_\_ if you want to search for words without any special character in them.

inputs.name: SecretVariables
inputs.label: Secret Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the Secret Variable Names in the format SecretVariableName followed by : followed by $(SecretVariableName). Multiple values are supported. Enter 1 in each line.
